description_html:
Zenzero Bench has issued a new edition in hand carved solid American Black Walnut planks supported by Polished Nickel Brass Legs.
Inspired in the wake of Hurricane Sandy to make furniture from downed trees, the process has evolved to become a strong residential accent piece. Walnut planks are glued to form a large volume that is then hand carved to shape a long seat with a partial backrest. The body is supported by water jet cut steel legs that are finished in Polished Nickel Brass. The organic form floats above a series of legs and is capped on each side with a unique leg shape that sits flush with the wood.
